N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 629.2 - Conditions for reimbursement for JOBS training program activities and related supportive services

State Regulations
(a) No portion of any claims for
reimbursement may be supported solely with State funds if reimbursement may be
claimed from a program for which there is Federal financial
participation. (b) Claims for
reimbursement from any portion of a program or activity for which there is

Federal financial participation which were not fully reimbursed as claimed and
which were properly made at the time they were originally claimed may be
reclaimed as expenses for which Federal financial participation is available if
such claims were appropriate when originally submitted, provided the revised
claims are timely and adjustments to reduce the original claims are
simultaneously submitted to the department. (c) Claims for reimbursement for activities
that are available to participants of JOBS training program services or related
supportive services but which are nonreimbursable costs as described in section
609.3
of this Title cannot be
submitted or claimed as reimbursable with JOBS training program
funds. (d) Claims for reimbursement
for JOBS training program activities or related supportive services cannot be
submitted for reimbursement if such claims seek reimbursement at rates or for
amounts that are greater than the rates or amounts permitted by law or by the
department. (e) Claims for
reimbursement for expenditures made under the JOBS training program cannot be
submitted for reimbursement if such claims seek reimbursement for services that
would have been available to participants in JOBS training program services
from a community-based program. (f) Claims for reimbursement for JOBS training program activities and related
supportive services are subject to the availability of State and Federal funds, as determined by the commissioner. (g) Claims subject to reimbursement under the

Food Stamp Employment and Training Program described in section
387.23
of this Title or claims for
expenditures for State or other employment programs that cannot be reimbursed
in accordance with the provisions of title IV-F of the Federal Social Security

Act cannot be submitted under the provisions of this Part; such claims must be
coordinated with the claims subject to this Part in accordance with department
directions set forth in section
600.2
(g) of this

Title. (h) Any adjustments of
claims for reimbursement must be made in accordance with department directions
as defined by section
600.2
(g) of this

Title. Notes
